titleStmt.title: Times curtaine dravvne, or the anatomie of vanitie VVith other choice poems, entituled; health from Helicon. By Richard Bathvvayte Oxonian.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson for Iohn Bellamie, and are to be sould at the south entrance of the Royall-Exchange,

notesStmt.note: "Panedone: or health from Helicon" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
